attributes.action: Negotiate the Dame-hood of Julie Walters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Julie Walters has given up most of her life to steal the hearts of film-lovers across the globe! She has worked along-side DAME Helen Mirren and many other iconic figures. 

We praise the queen for giving this inspirational lady the titles; CBE & OBE.... But we now feel it is time for her to celebrate her hard-working life, that she has committed to British Citizens.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
